          <title>
            <string language="en">Diffraction of plane waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung der flachen Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffraction des ondes planes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diffraction de ondas planas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffrazione delle onde piane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση των επίπεδων κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difracción de ondas planas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how plane waves spread out from points along a gap in a barrier.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie flache Wellen heraus 
von den Punkten entlang einem Abstand in einer Sperre verbreiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les ondes planes
étendent des points le long d'un intervalle dans une barrière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as ondas planas 
espalham para fora dos pontos ao longo de uma abertura em uma 
barreira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le onde piane si 
spargono fuori dai punti lungo uno spacco in una barriera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα επίπεδα κύματα 
διαδίδουν έξω από τα σημεία κατά μήκος ενός χάσματος σε ένα 
εμπόδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las ondas planas 
se separan hacia fuera de puntas a lo largo de un boquete en una 
barrera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräuselung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Beugung</string>
